doc.previous: In particular if F is grade 1 vector valued function then we can write Let F be an r grade multivector Then we can define an additional pair of operators the interior and exterior derivatives
doc.after: and identify the divergence and curl as Note however that these two operators are considerably weaker than the geometric derivative counterpart for several reasons Neither the interior derivative operator nor the exterior derivative operator is invertible
